name: Need for Speed Heat
summary: Need for Speed Heat is an upcoming racing video game developed by Ghost Games and published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It is the twenty-fourth installment in the Need for Speed series and will commemorate the series' 25th anniversary.
info:
• 中文名: 极品飞车：热度

  • 游戏类型: RAC

  • 开发: Ghost Games
